title: Household bills could rise by £21 as Ofgem considers increasing energy price cap
lead: The regulator is consulting on its proposals to recover debt-related costs that have resulted due to the coronavirus pandemic

title: Second farmer-led group set up in Scotland to tackle climate change
lead: The Arable Sector Climate Group will identify measures that support the arable and cropping sectors to contribute to Scotland’s climate targets

title: Scientists discover novel way of using wasted milk to capture CO2 emissions
lead: Surplus milk could be converted into activated carbons that could adsorb the carbon dioxide, according to a new research

title: Vattenfall unveils plans for 156MW Scottish wind farm
lead: The wind project is predicted to generate enough energy to power the equivalent of 117,500 homes

title: Government injects £61m into ‘Europe’s largest’ flying lab for climate change
lead: The jet supports research on environmental challenges such as climate change and severe weather events

title: Government-backed satellite to measure climate change launched on SpaceX rocket
lead: Sentinel-6 will allow accurate prediction of sea level rise and storm surge, reducing the risk of damage from unexpectedly high flood

title: Almost 84% of British homeowners ‘plan to make their property greener in next 12 months’
lead: More than half of the homeowners would make improvements in order to reduce their energy bills, according to a new report

title: UN Chief calls on the EU to cut emissions by 55% by 2030
lead: The UN Secretary General said while he applauded EU’s climate achievements, the world is still ‘nowhere near the climate race’s finish line’

title: Projects awarded £10m to plant 84k trees across the UK
lead: A total of 134,000 trees are planned to be planted through the Urban Tree Challenge Fund

title: Noble Foods pays £50k for polluting stream with wastewater
lead: The money has been given to the Lincolnshire Rivers Trust to fund environmental improvements following an investigation by the Environment Agency
